lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But there are more positives than negatives," she said, citing reduced capacity in the domestic industry, better prices, and a weaker dollar, which should cause steel imports to drop off slightly from last year.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Armco's steelmaking operations are profitable, the balance sheet has been improved, and its oilfield equipment business has been slimmed and put in a joint venture with USX, Bradford noted.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Peter Marcus of Painewebber Inc is neutral on the group although he said the earnings outlook is improved through the third quarter.
